snippet.title: Hexxen: Hunters - Announcement Trailer | Dark Fantasy Tactical RPG
snippet.description:
A hundred years have passed since the gate to Hell opened, deep in the Black Forest of southern Germany. The world has since been infested by beasts and fiends of all kinds, but portents tell of a greater threat on the horizon – your Witch Hunters are all that stand between humanity and certain doom.

WISHLIST ON STEAM: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2100400/Hexxen_Hunters/

EPIC: https://store.epicgames.com/p/hexxen-hunters-e63cbb

Check out all Hooded Horse strategy games:
➤ Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/publisher/HoodedHorse
